Title: The Bar at the Crossing
Writer: François Boyer (dialogue), Gilbert De Voisins (novel), Philippe Dumarçay, Alain Levent
Actors: Jacques Brel, Rosy Varte, Malka Ribowska, Gabriel Jabbour
Plot: In 1916, Vincent van Horst leaves Europe to return to his Canadian homeland. There, he seeks his former love, Maria... but the lady's pride is hurt and she refuses to see him. Vincent then ...
